title: Heidi Klum Halloween costumes over the years ahead of 2019 look
text:
The true queen of Halloween (Picture: Getty/Rex

Christmas may be owned by Mariah Carey and Michael Buble, but Halloween – that’s all Heidi Klum’s.

The model is the undisputed queen of Halloween, thanks to her exceptional annual costumes that blow her famous friends out of the water.

Heidi, 46, has been throwing her own Halloween bash since 2000, but over the years, her costumes have becoming increasingly more impressive – from using prosthetics to morph into Jessica Rabbit, to undergoing a full body transformation to look like an ape.

The German star kicked off the spooky season at Paris Hilton‘s Halloween bash covered in glitter and accompanied by her husband Tom Kaulitz, but we have a few days left until we see what her official 2019 costume is.

Speaking to Entertainment Tonight, the mum-of-four teased: ‘I’m trying to do something very special on that day, because it’s 20 years already. I can’t believe it! 20 years ago, I thought, “There is no real cool party in New York City and someone has to do this.” And so I did.”

‘I’m pressuring myself. It’s not the outside world, it’s really me. I want to outdo myself every year again.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’m going to have a very hard time walking, and it’s going to take a really long time putting it together.’

Back in August, Heidi shared a video of her body being computer mapped, while last week, she showed off a teeth grill she had specially fitted for the night.

So, until we get to see Heidi’s 2019 creation, let’s take a look at the Halloween queen’s best looks over the years.

2000 – Dominatrix

Heidi was a bit more basic in 2000 (Picture: Tom Wargacki/WireImage)

2001 – Lady Godiva

Now that’s more like it (Picture:Evan Agostini/Getty Images)

2002 – Betty Boop

We love this look (Picture: Evan Agostini/ImageDirect)

2003 – Golden gladiator

We’re not entirely sure what it is, but A for effort (Picture: Evan Agostini/Getty Images)

2004 – Witch

Heidi amped up the classic witch look (Picture: Evan Agostini/Getty Images)

2005 – 80s vampire

Was this inspired by Cher? (Picture: Evan Agostini/Getty Images)

2006 – Forbidden fruit

This is when Heidi started getting kooky (Picture: Michael Buckner/Getty Images)

2007 – Cat

This is how you elevate a cat costume (Picture: Charley Gallay/Getty Images)

2008 – Kali, the Hindu goddess of death and time

This was Heidi’s first real showstopper (Picture: Charles Eshelman/FilmMagic)

2009 – Crow

Ma-caw! (Picture: Valerie Macon/Getty Images)

2010 – Robot

Heidi went all out in latex (Picture: Bryan Bedder/Getty Images)

2011 – Ape

Heidi and then-husband Seal were unrecognisable (Picture: Jemal Countess/Getty Images)

2011 – Human Body (second costume)

Heidi was wheeled to her party on a gurney (Picture: Michael Tran/FilmMagic)

2012 – Cleopatra

Fit for a queen (Picture: Michael Loccisano/Getty Images for Heidi Klum)

2013 – Old woman

One of our all time favourites (Picture: Amanda Schwab/Starpix/REX)

2014 – Butterfly

Like something fresh out of Cirque du Soleil (Picture: Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Heidi Klum)

2015 – Jessica Rabbit

This was a work of art (Picture: Nicholas Hunt/Getty Images for Heidi Klum)

2016 – Heidi Klum and her clones

Low effort, high impact (Picture: Mike Coppola/Getty Images for Heidi Klum)

2017 – Michael Jackson’s Thriller

This was pretty epic (Picture: Gilbert Carrasquillo/GC Images)

2018 – Fiona from Shrek

Heidi and her now-husband Tom were fresh outta the swamp (Picture: Michael Loccisano/Getty Images)

description: Heidi Klum's best Halloween costumes over the years from 2000-2018 as she teases 'special' outfit for 2019 party.
